>I am a **cognitive scientist** interested in the application of **Bayesian modelling** in the
investigation of **early language acquisition**. As part of my PhD in Biomedicine at at the [Center for Brain and Cognition](https://www.upf.edu/web/cbc) at Universitat Pompeu Fabra (Barcelona, Spain), I study how **bilingual toddlers** develop their **vocabulary**, using both experimental and observational techniques.
